verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:19
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever will not hearken unto my words which he shall speak in my name, I will require it of him.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:20
verses.text: But the prophet, which shall presume to speak a word in my name, which I have not commanded him to speak, or that shall speak in the name of other gods, even that prophet shall die.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:21
verses.text: And if thou say in thine heart, How shall we know the word which the Lord hath not spoken?
